author: Abrath - Associação Terapeutas.
content:
VIBRAÇÃO ALTA! Imuniza o covid-19?
NÃO  ISSO É FAKE NEWS. Estão compartilhando milhares de mensagens falando que padrões vibratórios altos  imunizam todos os tipos de doença e o covid-19  isso é uma informação INCORRETA  ou melhor  INCOMPLETA. Uma mentira de tratamento foi compartilhada milhares de vezes  e alguem esta ganhando dinheiro enganando pessoas  ajude a combater os falsos terapeutas  compartilhe este também. Denuncie para juridico@abrath.org.br Existem diversos estudos e relatos  e a própria medicina holística em todos os seus aspectos concorda com isso  que padrões vibratórios altos nos protegem  e isso é verdade  só que em nosso planeta  é impossível manter determinados padrões vibratórios altos o tempo todo  principalmente para pessoas que tem família  trabalho  religião  ou seja  tem uma vida terrestre. Não há como manter tal padrão vibratório continuo 24 horas por dia. Vivemos de momentos  que podem ser altos ou baixos. O trabalho de um terapeuta é te conduzir ao aumento de seu campo vibracional  através das mudanças em sua vida  de suas escolhas.
Entenda que deves manter uma vibração alta  porque queres ser uma pessoa melhor e com saúde  não porque estas com medo da morte ou de um vírus  além do que  para manter uma vibração alta  depende exclusivamente de você e de técnicas aplicáveis em seu dia a dia e de aspectos comportamentais em sua alimentação e na sua higiene física  emocional e mental  tudo assessorado por um terapeuta.
Quando for se consultar com algum terapeuta  tome alguns cuidados  verifique se tem registro profissional  verifique na entidade se de fato a entidade existe e se o terapeuta é de fato registrado  veja se tem telefones e mídias sociais confiáveis para contato  se for pagar  use pagamentos com seguro  como pagseguro  paypal  mercado pago  procure entrar em grupos e verificar com clientes se foram bem atendidos.
Se um terapeuta ou qualquer pessoa falar que imuniza  trata  ou impede o vírus do covid-19  procure a Abrath e denuncie  temos um departamento jurídico que age contra terapeutas filiados ou não filiados extra e juridicamente.
A Abrath protege os seus terapeutas filiados e os clientes também  por isso  tratar-se com um terapeuta filiado a Abrath é caminho para credibilidade.
Completamos 13 anos de experiência e mais de 6 mil terapeutas filiados.
Nosso trabalho não é pela regulamentação da profissão  mas sim pela capacitação dos terapeutas perante a sociedade e órgãos de fiscalização através da auto-regulamentação  que é fundamental para uma futura regulamentação  ainda muito longe de ser alcançada. Quer saber se um terapeuta possui o registro profissional CRTH-BR da Abrath:
https://www.abrath.org.br/localizar-filiados.php Quer fazer um anuncio de graça e ser localizado pelos seus futuros clientes:
https://painel.brasilterapias.com.br/cadastro/ Quer ter seu próprio prontuário holístico e emitir contrato  recibo  atestado ...
https://prontuario.abrath.com.br/ Quer se filiar a Abrath? www.abrath.org.br

author: Department of Health (Philippines)
content: LOOK: DOH COVID-19 CASE BULLETIN #158 As of 4PM today  August 19  2020  the Department of Health reports the total number of COVID-19 cases at 173 774. A total of 4 650 confirmed cases are reported based on the total tests done by 97 out of 105 current operational labs. DOH likewise announces 716 recoveries. This brings the total number of recoveries to 113 481. Note: Of the 4 650 reported cases today  3 848 (83%) occurred within the recent 14 days (August 6 -19  2020). The top regions with cases in the recent two weeks were NCR (2 576 or 67%)  Region 4A (574 or 15%) and Region 6 (156 or 4%.) Of the 111 deaths  76 (68%) in August  13 (12%) in July  8 (7%) in June  9 (8%) in May  and 5 (5%) in April. Deaths were from NCR (52 or 47%)  Region 7 (29 or 26%)  Region 4A (11 or 10%)  Region 3 (6 or 5%)  Region 9 (4 or 4%)  REPATRIATE (4 or 4%)  Region 6 (2 or 2%)  Region 5 (1 or 1%)  Region 11 (1 or 1%)  and BARMM (1 or 1%.) There were eighty-nine (89) duplicates that were removed from the total case count. Of these  sixty-nine (69) were recovered and two (2) deaths have been removed. Moreover  there were twenty-seven (27) cases that were previously reported as recovered but after final validation  they were deaths (26) and active (1) cases. There's also one (1) case that was previously reported as death has been validated to be a recovery. These numbers undergo constant cleaning and validation.

author: VoxCheck
content:
⚡ WHO asks the country not to introduce quarantine! But... ours then sat at home for a few months? ⚠ calmly  it's just another fake. 🔻 Ukrainian media write for the second day in a row  allegedly WHO chief epidemiologist Maria Van Kerhove urged not to introduce quarantine again. All of them are massively referring to the Russian medical edition - those wrote about it on August 17 And now they are not referring to anyone. And they don't even tell where Mrs. Van Kerkhove stated this (https://bit.ly/34aqM1u). 🔻 It turned out that it's not really news - on August 1  Maria Van Kerhove gave an interview to the British edition of The Telegraph (https://bit.ly/3iORm4f). It was about lokdown - what we called exactly ′′ strict quarantine ". The publication came out with the title ′′ leading epidemiologist of WHO urges not to return public locks ". 🔻 But the Telegraph also did not resist the clickbait title - that's exactly what Van Kerkhove didn't say. She stated that ′′ I don't know that ′′ I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't know that I don't need it again ′′). 🔻 Van Kerhove also said lokdown is not what WHO recommended (previously)  but in some countries it really needed to stop the rapid spread of the disease. And added that the lokdown doesn't work on its own - it's a set of measures that states should introduce to hold back the outbreaks. Apparently  that's exactly what British journalists wrote the title. 💭 The day before the publication of Telegraph Van Kerkhove at a briefing WHO said that now countries are learning and seeing more effective methods to track and stop the disease. Consequently  there is no way to do anything (https://bit.ly/2EadbfI). 🤔 Do you feel the difference between ′′ WHO urged no more quarantine ′′ and between the hopes that the lokdown will no longer be needed  because there are already more effective methods? 📌 Such news is just a cross-country example of how fake flies and how to recognize it.
▪ Your source (in our case Russian medical portal) does not tell where he has such information.
▪ You don't see a direct quote that matches the title.
▪ The information itself appeared a few weeks ago  but it only flown now. ℹ By the way  what quarantine measures were like in different countries of the world  told in this video: https://youtu.be/ObNcPwCTKP4

author: Alhena Hyadum
content:
Las mascarilla te causará  la enfermedad de hipercapnia  nace por el exceso de dióxido de carbono(CO2)  en el torrente sanguíneo.

El problema surge por la falta de ventilación pulmonar  en la que la insuficiencia respiratoria  y el esfuerzo por controlarla  hace que se inhale mucho CO2 que luego no se logra evacuar. Esta retención del dióxido de carbono  provoca una acificación respiratoria.

La palabra hipercapnia significa “demasiado humo“. Provoca exceso de respiración  en la que un falla grande  puede terminar en síndrome de la muerte súbita.

We would like to disclose the press release of the Russian Direct Investment Fund on the issue of supplies to the Argentine Republic of the drug ′′ Avifavir ′′ designed for patients suffering from the novel coronavirus  as announced Monday by the Fund. 🔹 ′′ The Russian Direct Investment Fund (RDIF)  claimed that at least 150.000 AVIFAVIR treatments  an antiviral of excellent results for COVID 19 treatment  will be sent to Latin America in the coming months. 🔹 This is not just a shipment of drugs  but in the medium term technology is expected to be transferred to each country so that they can independently develop medicine. 🔹 In a meeting held last Wednesday  July 29  an exclusive representation and marketing agreement has been signed for AVIFAVIR between the producer laboratory  CHROMIS  Russia Direct Investment Fund (RDIF) and the Bolivian laboratory SIGMACORP  who acquired exclusivity for distribution of medicine in Argentina  Bolivia  Paraguay  Uruguay and Central America  represented by Mr. Philip Lichtenfeld  Director of International Trade Division  Sigma Corp Pharmaceutical Chemical Industry. 🔹 In turn  Lichtenfeld is working on building an alliance with a prestigious laboratory in Argentina to distribute medicine in the country and eventually make it. In that sense CHROMIS  and the local laboratory  have begun working on the required requirements  to begin distributing AVIFAVIR in Argentina in the shortest possible span. 🔹 In concordance  the new medicine was already presented to the authorities of the Ministry of Health  with the aim of making public the arrival of the antiviral  which has been administered in mild and moderate patients in countries like Russia and China  giving surprising results : 🔹 It's not a vaccine  it doesn't prevent disease  but it's very effective in symptom relief. 65 % of patients  according to clinical studies  have recovered in just 4 days  while 85 % tested negative in 5 days  when the average virus negative process is 10 days. 🔹 This result  not only helps patients  but also the whole health system which prevents those infected with moderate symptoms from becoming severe  avoiding the use of respirator and intensive care rooms  and evacuates with higher speeds Hospital beds  Philip Lichtenfeld said who claimed they trust that by mid-September AVIFAVIR is already in a position to be distributed and administered in the country ". author: Roberto Manzo
content:
Da un illuminante discorso del virologo dottor. A. Fauci  Comprensibile per tutti  anche per i non medici  da leggere.

“La varicella è un virus. Molte persone l'hanno avuto  e probabilmente non ci pensano molto una volta che la malattia iniziale è passata. Ma rimane nel tuo corpo e vive lì per sempre  e forse quando sei più grande  si potranno avere episodi dolorosamente debilitanti di fuoco di Sant'Antonio. Non riesci a superare questo virus in poche settimane  senza avere un altro effetto sulla salute.
Lo sappiamo perché è in circolazione da anni ed è stato studiato a livello medico per anni.

Anche l'herpes è un virus. E una volta che lo contrai rimane nel tuo corpo e vive lì per sempre  e ogni volta che sei stanco o stressato avrai una ricaduta. Anche per un semplice evento (foto di scuola  colloquio di lavoro  grande appuntamento) potrai sviluppare i sintomi.
Per il resto della tua vita.
Non lo supererai in poche settimane.
Lo sappiamo perché esiste da anni ed è stato studiato a livello medico per anni.

L'HIV è un virus. Attacca il sistema immunitario e rende il contagiato molto più vulnerabile ad altre malattie. Ha un elenco di sintomi e impatti negativi sulla salute che continuano all'infinito. Ci sono voluti decenni prima che fossero sviluppati trattamenti praticabili tali da permettere alle persone di sopravvivere con una ragionevole qualità della vita. Una volta che lo hai  vive nel tuo corpo per sempre e non c'è cura. Nel corso del tempo  ciò provoca un impatto sul corpo  mettendo le persone che vivono con l'HIV a maggior rischio di patologie come malattie cardiovascolari  malattie renali  diabete  malattie ossee  malattie del fegato  disturbi cognitivi e alcuni tipi di cancro.
Lo sappiamo perché esiste da anni ed è stato studiato a livello medico per anni.

Ora con il COVID-19  abbiamo un nuovo virus che si diffonde rapidamente e facilmente. L'intero spettro di sintomi ed effetti sulla salute sta appena iniziando a essere catalogato  molto meno compreso.
Finora i sintomi includono:
Febbre
fatica
tosse
polmonite
Brividi / tremori
Disturbo respiratorio acuto
Danno polmonare (potenzialmente permanente)
Perdita di gusto (un sintomo neurologico)
Gola infiammata
mal di testa
Respirazione difficoltosa
Confusione mentale
diarrea
Nausea o vomito
Perdita di appetito
Ictus
Occhi gonfi
Coaguli di sangue
convulsioni
Danni al fegato
Danni ai reni
Eruzione cutanea
Le persone che risultano positive al test per Covid-19 sono state classicate come malate anche dopo 60 giorni. Molte persone si ammalano per settimane  migliorano  quindi subiscono una rapida e improvvisa riacutizzazione e si ammalano di nuovo. Un uomo a Seattle è stato ricoverato in ospedale per 62 giorni e  sebbene abbastanza in forma da essere dimesso  ha ancora una lunga strada da percorrere. Per non parlare di una fattura medica da $ 1 1 milioni di dollari.
E poi tra i sintomi  c'è la MIS-C. La sindrome infiammatoria multisistemica nei bambini  una condizione in cui diverse parti del corpo possono infiammarsi  tra cui cuore  polmoni  reni  cervello  pelle  occhi o organi gastrointestinali. I bambini con MIS-C possono avere febbre e vari sintomi  tra cui dolore addominale  vomito  diarrea  dolore al collo  eruzione cutanea  occhi iniettati di sangue o sensazione di stanchezza.
Sebbene rara  ha causato anche dei giovanissimi morti.

Ecco  il Covid-19 non esiste da anni. Sono trascorsi praticamente solo 6 mesi. Nessuno sa ancora gli effetti a lungo termine sulla salute  o come potrebbe presentarsi anni dopo il percorso di vita per le persone che sono state esposte. Letteralmente non sappiamo ciò che non sappiamo.

Per quelli nella nostra società che suggeriscono che le persone prudenti sono solo dei codardi  per le persone che rifiutano di prendere anche le più semplici precauzioni per proteggere se stesse e coloro che le circondano  voglio chiedere  senza iperbole e in tutta sincerità:
Come osate?
Come osate rischiare la vita degli altri in modo così sprezzante?
Come osate decidere per gli altri che secondo voi dovrebbero accettare l'esposizione al virus così da “superarla e via” quando letteralmente nessuno sa chi sarà il caso fortunato dai "sintomi lievi" e chi invece si ammalerà e morirà?
Perché mentre sappiamo che alcune persone sono più suscettibili alla sofferenza del caso più grave  sappiamo anche che giovani di 20 e 30 anni sono morti  corridori di maratona e campioni di fitness sono morti  bambini e neonati sono morti.
Come osate comportarvi come se ne sapeste più di medici e ricercatori esperti  quando quegli stessi medici e ricercatori riconoscono che c'è così tanto che non sappiamo ancora  ma con quello che sappiamo  sono abbastanza intelligenti da avere paura di quanto facilmente si diffonda  e raccomandare precauzioni di base.
Lavaggio frequente delle mani
Distanziamento fisico
Ridotto contatto o interazione sociale / pubblica
Indossare una maschera
tosse o starnuti nel gomito
Evitare di toccarti il viso
Sanificazione di superfici frequentemente toccate

Più cose possiamo fare per mitigare il rischio di esposizione  meglio stiamo tutti  secondo me. Non solo appiattisce la curva e consente agli operatori sanitari di mantenere livelli di servizio che non sono immediatamente e catastroficamente sopraffatti; riduce anche le sofferenze e le morti inutili e guadagna tempo affinché la comunità scientifica studi il virus per giungere a una comprensione più ampia dell'ampiezza del suo impatto sia a breve che a lungo termine.

Respingo totalmente l'idea che sia "solo un virus" e alla fine lo prenderemo tutti.
È una posizione egoista  pigra e senza cuore."

Anthony Fauci

author: Amy Wright
content:
Here is my take. Short-sighted people want to dismiss COVID-19 as "just a virus". You may hear some suggest it's "like a cold". Maybe that makes them feel better because it's familiar and makes this crisis feel less overwhelming. But here's the problem with that: Chicken pox is a virus. Lots of people have had it  and probably don't think about it much once the initial illness has passed. But it stays in your body and lives there forever  and maybe when you're older  you have debilitatingly painful outbreaks of shingles. You don't just get over this virus in a few weeks  never to have another health effect. We know this because it's been around for years  and has been studied medically for years. Herpes is also a virus. And once someone has it  it stays in your body and lives there forever  and anytime they get a little run down or stressed-out they're going to have an outbreak. Maybe every time you have a big event coming up (school pictures  job interview  big date) you're going to get a cold sore. For the rest of your life. You don't just get over it in a few weeks. We know this because it's been around for years  and been studied medically for years. HIV is a virus. It attacks the immune system  and makes the carrier far more vulnerable to other illnesses. It has a list of symptoms and negative health impacts that goes on and on. It was decades before viable treatments were developed that allowed people to live with a reasonable quality of life. Once you have it  it lives in your body forever and there is no cure. Over time  that takes a toll on the body  putting people living with HIV at greater risk for health conditions such as cardiovascular disease  kidney disease  diabetes  bone disease  liver disease  cognitive disorders  and some types of cancer. We know this because it has been around for years  and had been studied medically for years. Now with COVID-19  we have a novel virus that spreads rapidly and easily. The full spectrum of symptoms and health effects is only just beginning to be catalogued  much less understood. So far the symptoms reported include: Fever
Fatigue
Coughing
Pneumonia
Chills/Trembling
Acute respiratory distress
Lung damage (potentially permanent)
Loss of taste (a troubling neurological symptom)
Sore throat
Headaches
Difficulty breathing
Mental confusion
Diarrhea
Nausea or vomiting
Loss of appetite
Strokes have also been reported in some people who have COVID-19 (even in the relatively young)
Swollen eyes
Blood clots
Seizures
Liver damage
Kidney damage
Rash
COVID toes (weird  right?) People testing positive for COVID-19 have been documented to be sick even after 60 days. Many people are sick for weeks  get better  and then experience a rapid and sudden flare up and get sick all over again. A man in Seattle was hospitalized for 62 days  and while well enough to be released  still has a long road of recovery ahead of him. Not to mention a $1.1 million medical bill. Then there is MIS-C. Multisystem inflammatory syndrome in children is a condition where different body parts can become inflamed  including the heart  lungs  kidneys  brain  skin  eyes  or gastrointestinal organs. Children with MIS-C may have a fever and various symptoms  including abdominal pain  vomiting  diarrhea  neck pain  rash  bloodshot eyes  or feeling extra tired. While rare  it has caused deaths. This disease has not been around for years. It has basically been 6 months. No one knows yet the long-term health effects  or how it may present itself years down the road for people who have been exposed. We literally *do not know* what we do not know. For those in our society who suggest that people being cautious are cowards  for people who refuse to take even the simplest of precautions to protect themselves and those around them  I want to ask  without hyperbole and in all sincerity: How dare you? How dare you risk the lives of others so cavalierly. How dare you decide for others that they should welcome exposure as "getting it over with"  when literally no one knows who will be the lucky "mild symptoms" case  and who may fall ill and die. Because while we know that some people are more susceptible to suffering a more serious case  we also know that 20 and 30 year olds have died  marathon runners and fitness nuts have died  children and infants have died. How dare you behave as though you know more than medical experts  when those same experts acknowledge that there is so much we don't yet know  but with what we DO know  are smart enough to be scared of how easily this is spread  and recommend baseline precautions such as: Frequent hand-washing
Physical distancing
Reduced social/public contact or interaction
Mask wearing
Covering your cough or sneeze
Avoiding touching your face
Sanitizing frequently touched surfaces The more things we can all do to mitigate our risk of exposure  the better off we all are  in my opinion. Not only does it flatten the curve and allow health care providers to maintain levels of service that aren't immediately and catastrophically overwhelmed; it also reduces unnecessary suffering and deaths  and buys time for the scientific community to study the virus in order to come to a more full understanding of the breadth of its impacts in both the short and long term. I reject the notion that it's "just a virus" and we'll all get it eventually. What a careless  lazy  heartless stance. Being intentional and taking basic  common sense precautions has permitted me to avoid many common viruses. I've never had the flu. And while I'm not saying I never will  I also am not about to run out and intentionally expose myself to "get it over with". UPDATE: The post below was adapted from the following post  which had come to me from another FB friend without… More   Here is my take. Short-sighted people want to dismiss COVID-19 as "just a virus". You may hear some suggest it's… More

content:
МАСКА - КАК СПОСОБ ПОДЧИНЕНИЯ
Научно доказано  что ношение тех видов масок которые сейчас используются - абсолютно никак не защищает от вирусов.

Наоборот  частое их ношение ведёт к распираторным болезням и дисфункциям организма.

Зачем тогда их заставляют носить?

Это всемирный эксперимент мировых элит направленный на запугивание людей и управление их поведением.

Ношение масок постепенно изменяет реакции и восприятие человека  делает его покорным  молчаливым и безвольным.

Это способ тренировки и развития "выученной беспомощности" - состояние человека или животного  при котором индивид не предпринимает попыток к улучшению своего состояния  хотя имеет такую возможность.

Человек оторый носит регулярно носит маску  более покорен  более склонен к принятию "новой нормальности" - комплекса мер направленных на лишение людей их законных свобод и прав в пользу правителей.

Ношение маски это новая роль. Вспомните немецкий фильм Эксперимент (Das Experiment)   как менялось поведение нормальных адекватных людей  когда они брали на себя новую роль  надевая одежду смотрителя либо заключённого.

Это роль человека с закрытым ртом  которому неудобно общаться с другими  ему тяжело дышать  но управляемый страхом (болезни или штрафов) ради того чтобы "выжить" он носит маску  даже если внутренне не согласен с этим.

Маска - это символ современного рабства  способ тренировки рабского поведения и мышления.

А цель все таже.... перераспределение ресурсов и формирования общества "покорности".

Понимая это - оставайтесь свободными  становитесь более активными  соединяйтесь с единомышленниками и творите свое будущее. Это законное право которое дают людям Конституции всех стран мира.

П.С. Если согласны - делаем репост.

Волхв Огнь-Сварг-Владимир

author: Михаил Зернов
content:
Президент Мадагаскара сделал сенсационное заявление о том  что ВОЗ предложила ему взятку в размере 20 миллионов долларов за "отравление" используемого в стране лекарства от COVID-19 под названием "COVID-19 Organics"  изготовленное из артемизии. Мадагаскар попросил прикрыть эту лавочку аферистов и призвал все страны выйти из ВОЗ.

Президент Танзании выгнал представителей ВОЗ из страны после того  как Коза и образцы папайи дали положительный результат на ковид. Через несколько дней после танзанийского инцидента Бурунди также объявила персонами нон-гранта группу ВОЗ по коронавирусу за "вмешательство во внутренние дела". В перехваченном отчете также было обнаружено  что Билл Гейтс предложил взятку в 10 миллионов долларов за программу принудительной вакцинации против коронавируса в Нигерии. После чего  в Итальянском Парламенте итальянский политик потребовал арестовать Билла Гейтса  и раскрыл повестку дня Билла Гейтса в Индии и Африке  а также планы по борьбе с человеческой расой с помощью программы цифровой идентификации ID2020  которая объединяет иммунный паспорт  платежное средство (Виза  Мастеркард)  и которая уже тестируется в Африке.

Теперь вы понимаете  почему мотоциклетные смерти помечаются как ковидные  почем от 60 до 80%% ковидных смертей на западе состоялись в домах престарелых  и что Всемирный банк  МВФ и прочая подобная - это всего лишь банки менял в храме Всемирного резерва  делающие депопуляцию  о которой бредили Гейтс и экс-глава МВФ Лагард  и экономическую катастрофу во всем Мире.

Подумайте над простым фактом  что на момент 9/11 год всего 6 стран в Мире не имели "своих" ЦБ  контролируемых Ротшильдами - Сирия  Ирак  Иран  Ливия  Судан И Южная Корея  и что именно там теперь войны  за искл. СК  обезопасившей себя ЯО.

"Мы даем вам займ  но вы должны заблокировать свою страну и сломать всю экономику. Затем мы конфискуем все ваши активы после того  как ваша экономика будет разрушена..." - примерно так выглядит давление МВФ  ВОЗ и прочая. Вся идея МВФ и Всемирного банка заключается в том  чтобы заманить страны в ловушку бесконечных долгов и иметь возможность вымогать их.

Также  друзья  рассмотрите возможность того  что в МВФ не хотят получать обратно деньги  что они хотят захватить залог. Это естественное мошенничество всех банкиров: одолжить воздух  который им ничего не стоит  создать условия  при которых погашение невозможно  а затем собрать со всех твердые активы  заложенные в качестве залога. Это работало веками и будет работать и дальше.

Эта фальшивая пандемия была создана межнациональным преступным банковским / корпоративным синдикатом как механизм расширения глобального контроля и подрыва христианской западной цивилизации и наций. ООН  ВОЗ  МВФ  Всемирный банк  ФРС и почти все центральные банки  Google  YouTube  Twitter и МСМ-это лишь некоторые из инструментов подрывной деятельности  используемые для создания сатанинского оруэлловского мира.

Вспомните мольбу Джулиана Ассанжа  когда его тащили в цепях: "... вы должны сопротивляться!".

Цель их программы-контроль  их средства разнообразны  но всегда направлены на то  чтобы ослабить всех и вся. Отстранение себя от экономики лишает нас возможности участвовать в ней и отталкиваться от нее.

Не организовывать и не использовать накопленные богатства Страны для борьбы с ними  жить в нашем уютном бункере  считать запасы золота и боеприпасов-это именно то  что им нужно. Поймите  именно так выглядит отступление. Как и всякая ложь  они говорят нам  что наше отступление-это есть гуд и это наше возвышение и самоутверждение.

author: Lucia Azzolina
content: Matteo Salvini with his lies won't stop us from reopening schools in September. He keeps shooting fake news and creating chaos in families and the school world. I never said the statements he attributes to me on the benches. It's a quote he came up with because he has no argument. Here's how things stand on single counters: 1-The single counters necessary for the spacing required by the Health Ministry Cts guidelines don't necessarily have to be with ′′ wheels ". No one ever said that. We remember  however  that some of these benches are used in the most innovative schools in Italy. The benches then have different characteristics in relation to the age of students. They are furnishings that will stay in schools and will allow students to work together one day and have forms of teaching innovation. 2-No one said the counters will cost € 300. I challenge anyone to find a statement from me saying we'll buy € 300. benches. Yet I find in the newspapers and online quoted phrases that attribute this statement to me. There's a European race going on to cut costs. Moreover  as mentioned  there are more types of bench. 3-The benches are not THE unique solution we proposed to reopen in presence and security. The new furnishings are just one of the many things we've put on the pitch. We invested in the staff of school staff  invested in school building and finding new spaces  we also invest in school furnishings. Today I gave news of the government's commitment to allocate another EUR 300 million. With this we reach around 3 billion for September alone and 6 billion resources available to the school from the beginning of the year. Enough fake news. Salvini exploits the fears of Italians without ever making a proposal.

author: Delegación de Euskadi en Argentina-Mercosur
content:
ATENCIÓN! ADI!
A raíz de las declaraciones del Presidente Fernández en su comparecencia sobre la crisis del COVID-19  hemos solicitado una rectificación inmediata al Gobierno Argentino y estamos a la espera de su respuesta. Copiamos debajo la nota aclaratoria.
---
Fernández presidenteak COVID-19ren krisiari buruz egindako agerraldian egindako adierazpenen ondorioz  berehala zuzentzeko eskatu diogu Argentinako Gobernuari  eta haren erantzunaren zain gaude. -NOTA-
El Gobierno Vasco exige rectificación ante la grave afirmación del Presidente Fernández sobre la gestión de la pandemia en el País Vasco. El Presidente Excmo. Sr. D. Alberto Fernández  en su rueda de prensa del 17 de julio  mientras se dirigía a la ciudadanía argentina en relación con la pandemia  ha hecho una referencia al País Vasco y ha afirmado que “en el País Vasco cuando se vio saturada la capacidad de atención en los sanatorios y lamentablemente se tuvo que elegir quién se salvaba y quién se moría." A la vista de esta información  el Gobierno Vasco  a través de su Delegación en Buenos Aires  se ha dirigido por escrito al Gobierno Argentino señalando la falsedad de tal afirmación. Además  y habida cuenta de lo extremadamente sensible del tema y del grave daño que puede suponer para la reputación e imagen del País Vasco en Argentina  se ha solicitado una rectificación pública e inmediata. Desde que la pandemia irrumpió en el País Vasco el sistema sanitario vasco ha ofrecido atención de calidad a todas las personas afectadas por la Covid-19  tanto a los casos más leves como a aquellas personas que han presentado los cuadros más graves y necesitado ingreso  así ha sido reconocida por las propias vascas y vascos. De hecho  el sistema sanitario vasco ha atendido a todos los pacientes en las propias instalaciones sanitarias  sin recurrir a hospitales de campaña ni otras instalaciones no adecuadamente preparadas y sin que su capacidad en las Unidades de Cuidados Intensivos llegara a su ocupación plena.
Cabe señalar que la Comunidad Autónoma del País Vasco adoptó medidas ante la expansión de la Covid-19 incluso antes de que la OMS declarara oficialmente la Pandemia y que  desde que se levantó el Estado de Alarma  viene aplicando el Plan de Vigilancia estrecha de casos y contactos  que permite una acción inmediata “quirúrgica”. En medio de la pandemia  el País Vasco ha dado muestras de solidaridad y su sistema sanitario ha atendido a pacientes de otras Comunidades Autónomas y enviado material sanitario  fundamentalmente respiradores. En la actualidad profesionales del Servicio Vasco de Salud se encuentran en Perú colaborando en la atención a pacientes Covid-19.
Al margen de la pandemia  Euskadi es la Comunidad autónoma con mayor inversión per cápita en salud del Estado español -1.801 euros- Web de información oficial sobre el COVID-19: https://www.euskadi.eus/coronavirus/

author: Franco Russo
content:
BASTARDI CRIMINALI SENZA ONORE.
PROF. ZANGRILLO: "COVID? ARRIVA DALL'IMMIGRAZIONE INCONTROLLATA  DI CUI SIETE COMPLICI. Ci siamo chiusi in casa 3 mesi  abbiamo accettato l'elemosina da 600 euro  abbiamo penato per il diritto alla cassa integrazione e c'è chi ancora aspetta. Abbiamo abbassato le saracinesche dei negozi  chiuso imprese  abbiamo subíto la presa per il culo della "potenza di fuoco" e l'umiliazione di sanare un mancato fatturato con i prestiti delle banche come fossimo imprenditori falliti. Abbiamo subíto la scarcerazione dei boss  il puzzo della cloaca giudiziaria  le umiliazioni della UE per aiuti mai arrivati e guinzagli come il MES pronti a scattare. Abbiamo subíto il bavaglio per le manifestazioni non gradite  le multe ai commercianti  a chi portava a spasso il cane  a chi passeggiava in solitudine. Abbiamo subíto di tutto. Ora minacciate di prolungare questo scenario fino a dicembre perché c'è pericolo  il pericolo di perdere la poltrona. Il Covid? Arriva dall'immigrazione incontrollata di cui siete complici. Dagli sbarcati sulle nostre coste quasi 100 infetti in pochi giorni  più di 1000 dal Bangladesh arrivati con gli aerei senza controlli e molti positivi  altri arrivano dalla frontiera dell'est. Abbiamo accettato tutto per il bene dell'Italia  non accetteremo altro perché questo non è il bene dell'Italia  gli italiani il loro dovere lo hanno già fatto e non possono continuare a pagare per i clandestini che voi fate entrare liberamente. L'unico lockdown dovrebbero farlo gli italiani ai vostri palazzi. Infami maledetti.

Make a rapper 5 cubes of amenazine to the ass  so that he doesn't rave  I suggested. I just had a junk in my backpack  if you don't have enough rioting at conferences  or a terrorist shouting ′′ Stand  fear!"  will run by chance.
Everyone laughed  but I remembered the topic  although the conference was last year  long before the ′′ macaronavirus ′′ noise.
And here I am once again invited to a couple of conference exhibitions in London  March and November 2020 and the topic seems to be interesting  and a group of speakers with presentations is not very big. ′′ ID 2020 and safety ".
Well  they put a lot of different materials on my post office.
In March I missed one of their measures. And it was before the announcement of of quarantine in England.
A closed international exhibition of identification and processing of personal data  which was called: Digital: ID2020. Isn't it true - accidentally coincided: exactly the month when the world pandemic was declared  it was in March 2020 that the largest world project on presentation of a variety of digital identification systems? This exhibition will reach its climax at the so-called Identity Week 2020  held in London on November 17-18  2020 Here is the information in English: https://www.biometricupdate.com/201909/id2020-and-partners-launch-program-to-provide-digital-id-with-vaccines I think it's at this exhibition  exactly these days we will be presented with what coVID-19. was for. After the number-19  the number of 20 in other words is something that logically flows from one another. I think in November 2020 we will be presented with a digital identifier that will try to make a new standard of human passport. Here's how the goals and objectives of this exhibition are described: ′′ This world-class event is designed to help create a safer world where reliable identification solutions allow GOVERNMENTS AND COMMERCIAL ORGANIZATIONS to provide citizens  clients and consumers with many services  rights and opportunities for unhindered  but in that way same time for safe operations..."
But as it turns out  ID2020 at number 060606 (here they like round numbers and different signs) is not just a document  it is primarily a digital identity identification system project  which  if you believe  Wikipedia  is supported by the UN. (Google it) But that's not all  ID2020 Alliance is a ′′ global private-public partnership "  whose goal is to chip the world's population - funded by Microsoft Philantopies  Rockfeller Foundation  etc. (watch here: https://id2020.org/alliance) Actually  the chips need to be dealt with. There is a lot of things under this word. 1 _ There is a chip that Elon Musk makes  which is planned to impose serious physical ailments into the brain bark to help  say  people with a violation of the musculoskeletal  get rid of their own  before that incurable defects. These are the so-called ′′ neurointerfaces ′′ - edible dentures for the brain (paralyzed people  say  can control the exoskeleton using this device). A useful and great thing  in fact. 2 _ A completely different  invisible ′′ quantum dot ′′ tattoo ′′ developed by Bill Gates. author: Saint Luke's Health System
content:
False reports are circulating that say drinking alcohol can reduce the risk of COVID-19. THIS IS NOT TRUE. Saint Luke’s follows CDC guidance: -Practice good hand hygiene
-Wash for at least 20 seconds  especially after using the restroom  before eating  after blowing your nose or coughing.
-If soap and water aren’t available  use a hand sanitizer with at least 60 percent alcohol
-Avoid close contact with people who are sick and stay home when you are sick
-Avoid touching your eyes  nose  and mouth
-Cover coughs and sneezes with a tissue  then throw the tissue in the trash
-Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces using regular household cleaning spray or wipe

author: SBI - Sociedade Brasileira de Infectologia
content: IMPORTANTE || A avaliação do uso de qualquer medicamento fora de sua indicação aprovada deve ser uma decisão individual do médico  compartilhando os possíveis benefícios e riscos com o paciente. Porém é vedada a publicidade sobre tal conduta. Por conta de publicações recentes em redes sociais  a SBI emite comunicado de número 15 sobre a pandemia de COVID-19  sobre o uso de medicamentos. Para ler  acesse o link. | https://bit.ly/3g5p6sO

author: Lisa Tretter Minogue
content:
One of the many reasons I will never get a covid test.

This is HUGE!!!! The spot where they are "getting a sample" for the Covid-19 test is called your Blood-Brain Barrier. It is a single layer of cells that protect your brain from heavy metals  pesticides & other toxic substances that are usually kept out. It is the way vital nutrients  like oxygen  reach the brain.
If  in some way  your Blood-Brain Barrier is compromised  it becomes a "Leaky Blood-Brain Barrier" which is an inflamed brain! It then allows bacteria & other toxins to enter your brain & infect the brain tissue which can lead to inflammation and sometimes death.

****More symptoms (long & short term) include autism  ADD  ADHD  heart disease  autoimmune disease  cancer  neurodegenerative disease  stroke  liver damage  chronic fatigue that isn't resolved with rest  hypoxia  anxiety  mood disorders  depression & other mental health conditions like schizophrenia  seizures  memory loss & cognitive decline resulting in Alzheimer's or Dementia  insufficient blood flow to the brain  abnormal brain activity!

author: Bee Dumelod
content:
Babala! Hindi po ito totoo. Ang pH ng kahit anong bagay  pagkain man o hindi  buhay man o walang buhay  ay hindi lalampas sa 14 (maximum). Hanggang 6.9 ang acid  7.0 ang neutral  7.1-14 ang alkaline.

Lahat ng prutas na may mataas na acid (gaya ng lemon  lime  mango  tangerine  pineapple  at orange na nasa listahan) ay pH 2.8-4.2. Ang pinya  pH 5. Ang hinog na mangga  pH 6.0. Ang bawang (garlic)  5.8 at ang avocado ay pH 6.6. Ang dandelion (inihalo sa tsaa)  pH 7.0.
